message.content:
1. High miR-21 baseline plasma expression was observed in LAPC patients.
2. These LAPC patients were treated with induction chemotherapy.
3. These LAPC patients were also treated with chemo-radiotherapy after induction chemotherapy.
4. High miR-21 baseline plasma expression is associated with poor clinical outcome in these patients.

messages.content:
Statement: High miR-21 baseline plasma expression was associated with poor clinical outcome in LAPC patients treated with induction chemotherapy followed by chemo-radiotherapy.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
